ComicInfo.Title: The Death Dolls; The Devil from the Deep!; An Eye for an Eye; Dream Girl; The Pit and the Pendulum
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 10:15:44. [CVDB373705] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 21:37:41. [Issue ID 262140]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ed Goldfarb,Lee J. Ames,Everett Kinstler,Ed Goldfarb,Lee J. Ames,Everett Kinstler
ComicInfo.Inker: Bob Baer,Lee J. Ames,Everett Kinstler,Bob Baer,Lee J. Ames,Everett Kinstler
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Death Dolls: Dolls are seen committing crimes and a man becomes a doll to find out what was really happening.
The Devil from the Deep!: Men bring a mermaid in from the ocean, but find out she has a taste for human flesh.
An Eye for an Eye: A doctor accidentally blinds a man during surgery, and the man gets revenge.
Dream Girl: A statue comes to life and becomes whatever the men around her want her to be.
The Pit and the Pendulum: A man goes nearly mad being tortured in Spain.
ComicInfo.Characters: Frosty Nelson (crook),Lieutenant Bill Wilson,Weston,Mrs. Vanderhoff,Commissioner Billings
